variable.description: ECG: LEFT VENTRICULAR HYPERTROPHY CRITERIA S>=25MM, (R IN V5 OR V6) OR (S IN V1 OR V2)
variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB OR UNKNOWN

variable.value: FULLY PACED, COMPLETE LBBB OR UNKNOWN

OCCASIONALLY OR MODERATE AMOUNT OF TIME (3-4 DAYS)
MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

variable.value: WORSE THAN MOST PEOPLE YOUR OWN AGE

variable.name: FP532
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - DEMOGRAPHICS - IN THE SUMMER, ON AVERAGE, ABOUT HOW MAY HOURS PER DAY DO YOU SPEND OUTSIDE? (DO NOT INCLUDE TIME SPENT IN CARS / BUSES)

variable.name: FP533
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - DEMOGRAPHICS - IN THE SUMMER WHEN YOU WERE OUTSIDE, HOW MUCH OF YOUR SKIN WAS USUALLY EXPOSED TO THE SUN?

variable.name: FP534
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - ARE YOU IN BED OR IN A CHAIR FOR MOST OR ALL OF THE DAY (ON THE AVERAGE): (NOTE: THIS IS A LIFESTYLE QUESTION, NOT DUE TO HEALTH)

variable.name: FP535
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - DO YOU NEED A SPECIAL AID (WHEELCHAIR, CANE, WALKER) TO GET AROUND?

variable.name: FP537

variable.value: NO OR DO NOT NEED A SPECIAL AID TO GET AROUND

variable.value: NO OR DO NOT NEED A SPECIAL AID TO GET AROUND

variable.name: FP539

variable.value: NO OR DO NOT NEED A SPECIAL AID TO GET AROUND

variable.name: FP541
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - # OF DAYS IN PAST 6 MONTHS TOO SICK TO CARRY OUT USUAL ACTIVITIES

variable.name: FP542
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - ARE YOU ABLE TO DO HEAVY WORK AROUND HOUSE LIKE SHOVEL SNOW OR WASH WINDOWS, WALLS OR FLOORS WITHOUT HELP?

variable.name: FP543
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - ARE YOU ABLE TO WALK UP AND DOWN STAIRS TO THE SECOND FLOOR WITHOUT ANY HELP?

variable.name: FP544
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - ARE YOU ABLE TO WALK A MILE WITHOUT HELP?

variable.name: FP545
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - IF YOU HAD TO, COULD YOU DO ALL THE HOUSEKEEPING YOURSELF (LIKE WASHING CLOTHES AND CLEANING)?

variable.name: FP546
variable.description: ACTIVIES - IF YOU HAD TO, COULD YOU DO ALL THE COOKING YOURSELF?

variable.name: FP547
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - IF YOU HAD TO, COULD YOU DO ALL THE GROCERY SHOPPING YOURSELF?

variable.name: FP550
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - PULLING/PUSHING LARGE OBJECTS - LIKE A LIVING ROOM CHAIR

variable.name: FP552
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - REACHING OR EXTENDING ARMS BELOW SHOULDER LEVEL

variable.name: FP553
variable.description: ACTIVITIES-REACHING OR EXTENDING ARMS ABOVE SHOULDER LEVEL

variable.name: FP554
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - WRITING, HANDLING OR FINGERING SMALL OBJECTS

variable.name: FP555
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - STANDING IN ONE PLACE FOR LONG PERIODS, SAY FOR 15 MINUTES

variable.name: FP556
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - SITTING FOR LONG PERIODS, SAY 1 HOUR

variable.name: FP557
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - LIFTING A 10 LB OBJECT OFF THE FLOOR (SACK OF POTATOES)

variable.name: FP558
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - WALKING ONE HALF MILE (4-6 BLOCKS)

variable.name: FP559
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - IN PAST YEAR HAVE YOU ACCIDENTALLY FALLEN AND HIT THE FLOOR OR GROUND? (CODE AS NO IF DURING SPORTS ACTIVITY)

variable.name: FP560
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - IF YES (TO FP559), HOW MANY TIMES DID YOU FALL IN THE PAST YEAR?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL OR NOT APPLICABLE

variable.name: FP561
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - IF YES (TO FP559), THINKING OF THE FALLS YOU HAD IN THE PAST YEAR, IN WHAT DIRECTION DID YOU TEND TO FALL?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL OR NOT APPLICABLE

variable.name: FP562
variable.description: ACTIVITES - IF YES (TO FP559), DID ANY OF YOUR FALLS IN THE PAST YEAR RESULT IN A FRACTURE?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL OR NOT APPLICABLE

variable.name: FP563
variable.description: ACTIVITES - IF YES (TO FP559), DID ANY OF YOUR FALLS IN THE PAST YEAR RESULT IN A HEAD INJURY REQUIRING MEDICAL ATTENTION?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL OR NOT APPLICABLE

variable.name: FP564
variable.description: ACTIVITES - IF YES (TO FP559), DID ANY OF YOUR FALLS IN THE PAST YEAR RESULT IN A DISLOCATION?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL OR NOT APPLICABLE

variable.name: FP565
variable.description: ACTIVITES - IF YES (TO FP559), DID ANY OF YOUR FALLS IN THE PAST YEAR RESULT IN A BRUISE, SPRAIN OR CUT?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL OR NOT APPLICABLE

variable.name: FP566
variable.description: ACTIVITES - IF YES (TO FP559), DID ANY OF YOUR FALLS IN THE PAST YEAR RESULT IN OTHER THAN LISTED ABOVE?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL OR NOT APPLICABLE

variable.name: FP567
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - IF YES (TO FP559), DID YOU LOSE CONCIOUSNESS OR BLACK OUT BEFORE ANY FALLS IN THE PAST YEAR?
variable.value: DID NOT FALL OR NOT APPLICABLE

variable.name: FP568
variable.description: ACTIVITIES - BROKEN ANY BONES SINCE LAST VISIT?
